body:
Hey guys, this is my YouTube channel, check it out and subscribe!

UnstableExplosion
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Fxv4RFMYovDYC7orEesoA

Games playing:

Dreamcast

Sonic Adventure

PC

Minecraft
Five Nights at Freddy's 1
Five Nights at Freddy's 2
Five Nights at Freddy's 3 (and good ending walk-through)
 
Coming soon - what do you think?

PS2

Cel Damage
Seek and Destroy
Sonic Heroes
Shadow the Hedgehog
Road Trip Adventure!

Dreamcast

Phantasy Star Online (version 2 - makes no difference between version 1, just better)
Chu Chu Rocket!
MSR Street Racer (._.)
Trick Shot (skateboard game)
Sega Rally

PC

Team Fortress 2 (might do one)
Game Dev Tycoon
Robocraft
TankiOnline
Cookie Clicker (don't even ask)
Rust
Wakfu
LaTale (maybe solo or with a friend)
Worms Clan Wars (when I get a new computer)

Be sure to subscribe! Thanks a bunch!

replies.body:
I'll be playing games like Road Trip Adventure, Cel Damage. I do want to buy the Nintendo GameCube Sonic Heroes, but I don't own a GameCube yet.

I used to play Sonic Heroes a lot when I had a PS2, but I can agree with it's bugs and I have no idea what the fudge happened to Tails' voice.

replies.body:
UPDATE!

Well, I'm going to save up for a 720p/1080p CAPTURE CARD to record console footage like the Dreamcast, PS2 and other consoles! I hope this will help out with quality and better sound, but until I get £200 for a new capture card, the Dreamcast and other console series will have to wait.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Hey guys, this is totally up to you. But if you feel you want to help please do.

I know nobody will try to do it, but it is a shot;

I want to save up £150 for the Hauppage HD PVR 2 Console Capture Plus.

If you would like to donate please do. Sadly, I can't give anything in return. But when I reach that target. I will take a picture of it. To show you how much I appreciate your awesome help.
http://www.currys.co.uk/gbuk/gaming/pc-gaming-accessories/pc-gaming-accessories/other-gaming-accesso...

https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=KKYD9H4DAWWT2&lc=GB&item_name=Unstable...
